headline: Evening Boat Ride Varanasi: Watch Ganga Aarti from Water (2025 Guide)
description: Your complete 2025 guide to the evening boat ride in Varanasi for the Ganga Aarti. Find timings, costs, booking tips, and the best view from the water.

mainEntity.name: What is the best time for an evening boat ride to see the Ganga Aarti in Varanasi?

acceptedAnswer.text: The best time to board your boat is around 6:00 PM in winter or 6:30 PM in summer. This gets you to Dashashwamedh Ghat with about 45 minutes to spare before the Ganga Aarti ceremony begins at sunset.

mainEntity.name: How much does an evening boat ride for Ganga Aarti cost in Varanasi?

acceptedAnswer.text: A seat on a shared rowboat typically costs between ₹250 and ₹500 per person. A private rowboat can cost from ₹1,500 to ₹3,000. Prices are negotiable.

mainEntity.name: Which ghat is best for watching the evening Ganga Aarti from a boat?

acceptedAnswer.text: Dashashwamedh Ghat hosts the most famous and spectacular Ganga Aarti ceremony. An evening boat ride provides the best, unobstructed view of the rituals from the water.
